content: And so in those markets, we continue to see very strong demand from our customers, and that accounted for the strong $12.5 million billings we saw in Q3, as well as the $13 million to $15 million of billings that we'll see in Q4, and we expect that to continue to grow. Obviously, on a GAAP basis, we did see some significant headwinds this quarter, but a lot of that's behind us, and we're looking forward to continuing the process of putting together very, very detailed and specific plans on how to improve our gross margins, specifically in the fourth quarter and also going into 2023.
